node.excerpt: One of my goals in life is to visit all of America’s National Parks. They offer an incredibly diverse set of landscape spanning desert, to high mountains, beautiful forest and low lying swap. We are so lucky to have these lands and ecosystems…

“Excuse me, would you mind opening the window?” The woman sitting next to me on the plane asked, gesturing towards the window which had remained closed since the plane began taxiing back in Denver. “Sure!” As I opened the window, the bright…
